articles.title: Ancient Japanese hand techniques to reduce stress immediately - The Times of India
articles.description: ​Applying gentle pressure to specific points on the hands, such as the fleshy part between the thumb and index finger, stimulates relaxation and relieves tension.
articles.content: Massaging the palms, fingers, and between the joints increases blood circulation, releases muscle tension, and promotes a sense of calm.
